layout.singingstanza: Sing -- ing, pray -- ing, prais -- ing, thank -- ing, Sing -- ing, pray -- ing, prais -- ing, thank -- ing, Sing -- ing, pray -- ing, prais -- ing, thank -- ing, Hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Sing -- ing, pray -- ing, prais -- ing, thank -- ing.

lyrics.stanza: Singing, praying, praising, thanking, Singing, praying, praising, thanking, Singing, praying, praising, thanking, Hallelujah! Singing, praying, praising, thanking.
